title: Can't Post Comment (Not level 12?)
body:
So as the title says I can't comment in discussions because I'm not level 12? I don't understand exactly what this means but I have been level 30 in league for a while now. If anyone can help I would appreciate it.

Edit: I have changed my summoners name about a year ago, not sure if this would cause a problem or not.

replies.body: IF you are in EUNE server and you come across this guy "FilpapTheGreat"  he stole my account "Postra" and my other account "Alexouraz" right now he is on the "Alexouraz" account that account that he stole from me being a friend
After you posted, the forum synced with your information, and your level was updated.
Yep, thanks for letting me know <3
It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards.  Everything looks okay now, but let me know if it's still an issue.
